name: After School Enrichment Program
description: ASEP's mission is to provide the community with equal access to quality after school enrichment programming. ASEP combines Arts Enrichment, Academic Support and Health & Wellness into a comprehensive and specialized educational experience.
fullDescription: ASEP's mission is to provide the community with equal access to quality after school enrichment programming. ASEP combines Arts Enrichment, Academic Support and Health & Wellness into a comprehensive and specialized educational experience.
whatTheyOffer: ASEP's main office is no longer at 2201 Market. The main office phone/fax lines are no longer in service. The best way to contact the ASEP administrative team is info@asepsf.org ASEP's mission is to provide the community with equal access to quality after school enrichment programming. ASEP combines Arts Enrichment, Academic Support and Health & Wellness into a comprehensive and specialized educational experience.
